mapper.insert: insert into reservation (rno, ano, mno, arp_count, arp_price, arp_date) values (#{rno},#{ano},#{mno},#{arp_count},#{arp_price},now());
mapper.select: select (select ap_code_name from airport where ap_code = p.ar_from) ar_from, (select ap_code_name from airport where ap_code = p.ar_to) ar_to, (select agop_name from air_grade_option where agop_code = p.agop_code) agop_code, p.ar_from_date, p.ar_to_date, res.rno, res.arp_state from air_product p, reservation2 res where p.ano = res.out_ano and mno = #{mno};
